title: Reframing (And Reclaiming) Your Relationship With Food
description: The practice of intuitive eating is about reconnecting with our bodies, trusting our physical signals and forging a healthy relationship with food. And — importantly —  it's not about losing weight. (This episode originally ran in 2019.)
